name: Burger Builder
description:
🍔 A burger-building cooking game compatible across nearly any resolution (HD, 4K, etc) on mobile or desktop with 9 levels of difficulty. Build a set a burgers. Even given a time-limit and a score based on how fast you built it.

🖱️📱 You can play using just the mouse, but it is best played on a touch-screen mobile device.

⭐ I built this as a challenge with some friends. A very small game jam if you will.

This game is open sourced with the MIT license, feel free to fork:

👨‍💻️ https://github.com/lewdev/burger-builder

This game was built in pure JavaScript.
